Emphasis Typography

Bold

This is a sample of text as: bold or strong text..

<p>This is a sample of text as: <strong>bold or strong text..</strong></p>

Italics

This is a sample of text as: italicized or em text..

<p>This is a sample of text as: <em>italicized or em text..</em></p>

Small text

This is a sample of text as: small or fine print.

<p>This is a sample of text as: <small>small or fine print.</small></p>

Emphasis classes

This is a sample of text as: text-muted.

<p class="text-muted">This is a sample of text as: text-muted.</p>

This is a sample of text as: text-primary.

<p class="text-primary">This is a sample of text as: text-primary.</p>

This is a sample of text as: text-success.

<p class="text-success">This is a sample of text as: text-success.</p>

This is a sample of text as: text-info.

<p class="text-info">This is a sample of text as: text-info.</p>

This is a sample of text as: text-warning.

<p class="text-warning">This is a sample of text as: text-warning.</p>

This is a sample of text as: text-danger.

<p class="text-danger">This is a sample of text as: text-danger.</p>
Lists

Unordered Lists

Default

  • Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet
  • Consectetur adipiscing elit
  • Integer molestie lorem at massa
  • Facilisis in pretium nisl aliquet
  • Nulla volutpat aliquam velit
    • Phasellus iaculis neque
    • Purus sodales ultricies
    • Vestibulum laoreet porttitor sem
    • Ac tristique libero volutpat at
  • Faucibus porta lacus fringilla vel
  • Aenean sit amet erat nunc
  • Eget porttitor lorem
<ul>
  <li>..</li>
</ul>

Unstyled

  • Integer molestie lorem at massa
  • Facilisis in pretium nisl aliquet
  • Nulla volutpat aliquam velit
    • Phasellus iaculis neque
    • Purus sodales ultricies
    • Vestibulum laoreet porttitor sem
    • Ac tristique libero volutpat at
  • Faucibus porta lacus fringilla vel
  • Aenean sit amet erat nunc
  • Eget porttitor lorem
<ul class="list-unstyled">
  <li>..</li>
  <li>..</li>
  <li>
    <ul>
      <li>..</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

Inline

  • Lorem ipsum
  • Phasellus iaculis
  • Nulla volutpat
<ul class="list-inline">
  <li>..</li>
</ul>

Ordered Lists

Default

  1. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet
  2. Consectetur adipiscing elit
  3. Integer molestie lorem at massa
  4. Facilisis in pretium nisl aliquet
  5. Nulla volutpat aliquam velit
    1. Phasellus iaculis neque
    2. Purus sodales ultricies
    3. Vestibulum laoreet porttitor sem
    4. Ac tristique libero volutpat at
  6. Faucibus porta lacus fringilla vel
  7. Aenean sit amet erat nunc
  8. Eget porttitor lorem
<ol>
  <li>..</li>
  <li>..</li>
  <li>
    <ol>
      <li>..</li>
    </ol>
  </li>
</ol>

Description

Description lists
A description list is perfect for defining terms.
Euismod
Vestibulum id ligula porta felis euismod semper eget lacinia odio sem nec elit.
Donec id elit non mi porta gravida at eget metus.
<dl>
  <dt>..</dt>
  <dd>..</dd>
  <dt>..</dt>
  <dd>..</dd>
  <dd>..</dd>
</dl>

Horizontal description

Description lists
A description list is perfect for defining terms.
Donec id elit non mi porta gravida at eget metus.
Malesuada porta
Etiam porta sem malesuada magna mollis euismod.
Felis euismod semper eget lacinia
Fusce dapibus, tellus ac cursus commodo, tortor mauris condimentum nibh, ut fermentum massa justo sit amet risus.
<dl class="dl-horizontal">
  <dt>..</dt>
  <dd>..</dd>
  <dd>..</dd>
  <dt>..</dt>
  <dd>..</dd>
  <dt>..</dt>
  <dd>..</dd>
</dl>
FieldSets and Form Elements

FieldSet

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Nullam dignissim convallis est. Quisque aliquam. Donec faucibus. Nunc iaculis suscipit dui. Nam sit amet sem. Aliquam libero nisi, imperdiet at, tincidunt nec, gravida vehicula, nisl. Praesent mattis, massa quis luctus fermentum, turpis mi volutpat justo, eu volutpat enim diam eget metus.

Form Element

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Nullam dignissim convallis est. Quisque aliquam. Donec faucibus. Nunc iaculis suscipit dui. 
<div class="form-group">
  <label for="text_field">Text Field:</label>
  <input id="text_field" class="form-control" type="text">
</div>
<div class="form-group">
  <label for="password">Password:</label>
  <input id="password" class="form-control" type="password" name="password">
</div>
<div class="form-group">
  <label for="text_area">Text Area:</label>
  <input id="text_area" class="form-control" rows="3">
</div>
<div class="form-group">
  <label for="select_element">Select Element:</label>
  <select id="select_element" class="form-control">
    <option>1</option>
    <option>2</option>
    <option>3</option>
    <option>4</option>
    <option>5</option>
  </select>
</div>
<div class="form-group">
  <label>Checkboxes:</label>
  <label class="ui-checkbox">
    <input type="checkbox" value="option1" name="checkbox1">
    <span>Option 1</span>  
  </label>
  <label class="ui-checkbox">
    <input type="checkbox" checked value="option2" name="checkbox1">
    <span>Option 2</span>  
  </label>
  <label class="ui-checkbox">
    <input type="checkbox" value="option3" name="checkbox1">
    <span>Option 3</span>  
  </label>
</div>
<div class="form-group">
  <label>Disabled Checkboxes:</label>
  <label class="ui-checkbox">
    <input type="checkbox" disabled value="option1" name="checkbox1">
    <span>Option 1</span>  
  </label>
  <label class="ui-checkbox">
    <input type="checkbox" checked disabled value="option2" name="checkbox1">
    <span>Option 2</span>  
  </label>
</div>
<div class="form-group">
  <label>Radio Buttons:</label>
  <label class="ui-radio">
    <input type="radio" value="option1" name="radio1">
    <span>Option 1</span>  
  </label>
  <label class="ui-radio">
    <input type="radio" checked value="option2" name="radio1">
    <span>Option 2</span>  
  </label>
  <label class="ui-radio">
    <input type="radio" value="option3" name="radio1">
    <span>Option 3</span>  
  </label>
</div>
<div class="form-group">
  <label>Disabled Radio Buttons:</label>
  <label class="ui-radio">
    <input type="radio" value="option1" name="radio1">
    <span>Option 1</span>  
  </label>
  <label class="ui-radio">
    <input type="radio" checked disabled value="option2" name="radio1">
    <span>Option 2</span>  
  </label>
</div>
